## Scroll boxes

`.overflow-scroll .h5`

::: {.overflow-scroll .h5}
```{r}
mtcars
```
:::


`.overflow-scroll .h-25`

::: {.overflow-scroll .h-25}
```{r}
mtcars
```
:::

`.h-XX` come in 5% increments from 25 to 100%.
